snippet: “There Is Someone” is a show that has attracted a huge following with the sort of talk that is popular with young men everywhere, but censors and religious groups are not laughing.
abstract: Baghdad Journal; There Is Someone is a popular comedy television show that has attracted a huge following among young men in Iraq; show, which includes candid jokes about sex and relationships, lays bare the deep schisms in Iraqi society over the limits of Western-style notions of free speech; jokes have not gone over well with government censors and religious groups.
lead_paragraph: “There Is Someone” is a show that has attracted a huge following with the sort of talk that is popular with young men everywhere, but censors and religious groups are not laughing.

headline.seo: Iraqi TV Show Dares to Talk About Sex
headline.main: Sitting Around, Having a Drink, Joking About Sex. On Iraqi TV.
headline.print_headline: Sitting Around, Having a Drink, Joking About Sex. On Iraqi TV.
